content: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/204607-CARIN-IG.20for.20Blue.20Button.C2.AE/topic/Call.20Recaps/near/201611076 <- this is where i first brought up wildcard syntax, but its buried
https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-27861 is my summary of the issue
its really a question for the base spec though, not for any one IG
my IG-specific feedback is that I think IGs should be explicit about whether or not wildcard includes are required
for example, the latest (unpublished) carin-bb draft explicitly lists it
and I think all IGs should follow suit...otherwise folks will miss this and clients won't be able to depend on it
or, alternatively, if its not required for a given IG, I want to be able to infer that from its absence on the list :-)
include:* to be discussed at tomorrow's PDEX meeting....
If you are planning to bring a client or server to the plannet connectathon track...please tell me... thx
